Real Estate Stream

Take a recess from your busy workday with Market Leader’s educational podcast

[/et_pb_slide]

Subscribe to the Podcast

Subscribe to Real Estate Stream on iTunes, SoundCloud, Spreaker, and more!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Subscribe Button” button_url=”http://learn.marketleader.com/display/learning/Subscribe+to+Real+Estate+Stream#SubscribetoRealEstateStream-SpreakerWebsiteMobileApp” url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Subscribe” button_alignment=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#0075c9″ button_border_width=”0″ button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”off” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ custom_css_main_element=”width: 75%; text-align: center;”]

[/et_pb_button][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” custom_padding=”20px|||”]

About Real Estate Stream

Two universal constants for real estate professionals are that they lead exceptionally busy and mobile lives and that continuing education is a must if they want to be top performers. Lengthy, in-depth webinars and training sessions work exceptionally well for doing deep dives into important topics, but aren’t particularly accessible for real estate professionals during periods when they have limited downtime and are constantly on the move.

As Market Leader is committed to providing informative and engaging educational content for real estate professionals, we must meet our audience’s needs by producing materials that are accessible from anywhere and at anytime.

Introducing Market Leader’s new micro podcast, Real Estate Stream.

Take a recess from your busy workday with Real Estate Stream and learn how to experience more success and grow your business. In every episode, experts will succinctly cover important topics and provide practical tips and insight that you can use immediately to improve your business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_accordion admin_label=”Accordion” icon_color=”#005ea5″ toggle_font_size=”20″ body_font_size=”16″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” custom_css_toggle=”margin-bottom: 5px !important;” custom_css_open_toggle=”margin-bottom: 5px !important;” custom_css_toggle_icon=”display: none !important;”]

[et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #15 – The Journey of a Seller Lead”]

This episode is a must-listen for real estate agents who want to increase their seller lead conversion rate and win more listings. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #14 – How to Generate Leads With Facebook … For Free!”]

This episode is a must-listen for any agent who wants to see better results from their Facebook lead generation efforts. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #13 – How to Make a Great First Impression With New Online Leads”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate agent who wants to improve their initial lead follow up strategy and convert more of their leads. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #12 – MLS, IDX, & Listings: How Does It All Work?”]

This episode is a must-listen for any agent who hasn’t connected their MLS to their website or would like to learn more about the purpose, history, and function of MLSs. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #11 – How to Write Listing Descriptions That Sell”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who wants to learn to write compelling listing descriptions to better sell their clients’ homes. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #10 – How to Select a Vanity Domain for a Real Estate Website”]

This episode is a must-listen for any agent who needs help creating an effective domain name for their website. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #9 – SEO Basics: Internet Content Best Practices”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who wants to learn how to optimize the content they publish on their website so as to generate more organic traffic to it. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #8 – Lead Generation: An Overview of Paid Lead Types and Services”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who wants to get a better understanding of paid real estate lead generation. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #7 – Why Your Online Leads Don’t Leave Their Phone Numbers”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who wants to do a better job converting their online leads. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #6 – Get to Know Google Analytics, Part 2: Advanced Features”]

This episode is a must-listen for any Market Leader user who wants to leverage powerful website analytics software to get an edge on their competition. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #5 – Get to Know Google Analytics: A Basic Overview”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who wants to learn about this powerful website analytics software so they can better track the performance of their website. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #4 – Search Engine Ranking Factors, Part 2: Off-Page Ranking Factors”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who wants to understand the impact of links and social media on their website’s rankings in search engine results pages. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #3 – Understanding & Engaging Today’s Online Real Estate Consumer”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who is frustrated by not receiving responses from many of their online leads and wants to learn how to better engage them. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #2 – Search Engine Ranking Factors: Why Your Website Ranks Where It Does”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who wants to understand their website’s rankings in search engine results pages – and is motivated to achieve higher rankings! Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”EPISODE #1 – SEO 101: How Search Engines Work & How to Make Them Happy”]

This episode is a must-listen for any real estate professional who knows little to nothing about SEO but would like an introduction and wants to learn how to drive more traffic from search engines to their website. Listen to this episode >>

[/et_pb_accordion_item]

[/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
